repositories.author: WordPress
repositories.name: wordpress-develop
repositories.description: WordPress Develop, Git-ified. Synced from git://develop.git.wordpress.org/, including branches and tags! This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please include a link to a pre-existing ticket on https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ with every pull request.

repositories.author: Qloapps
repositories.name: QloApps
repositories.description: QloApps is a Free and Open-source hotel management and reservation system to take a hotel business online. QloApps offers a Property Management System (PMS), a Booking Engine, and an attractive Hotel Website. Elevate hotel operations with QloApps to streamline processes and provide an enhanced experience for both hoteliers and guests.
